src_original: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /  vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
tgt_original: 初向大乘善男子，犯根本等重罪有八。

src_original: katamā aṣṭau /
tgt_original: 何等為八？

src_original: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /  te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /  teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /  te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
tgt_original: 若有眾生，惡業因緣生五濁世，以少善根近善知識，聞此大乘甚深妙法，少覺少知少善根故，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，聞第一無相等經，轉為凡愚分別解說。

src_original: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /  te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /  eṣā ādikarmikabodhisatvasya mūlāpattiḥ prathamā //
tgt_original: 是凡愚人聞已驚畏，退失阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，願求聲聞乘，是名初發心菩薩犯初根本重罪。

src_original: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /  vastupatitaḥ parājitaḥ svargāpavargasukhāt /  visaṃvāditaṃ cāsya bodhicittam apāyagāmi bhavati /
tgt_original: 以是罪故，所修善根一切破壞，犯墮重罪，離於天人及涅槃樂，退菩提心當墮惡道，是故菩薩應知他心及善根已如應說法，如度大海漸漸深廣。

src_original: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
tgt_original: 「若初行菩薩語餘人言：

src_original: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
tgt_original: 『汝等不能行六波羅蜜；

src_original: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
tgt_original: 亦不能覺阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /  tena tvaṃ saṃsārān niryāsyasi /
tgt_original: 汝等速發聲聞辟支佛心，可得度於生死。

src_original: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 』餘如上說，是名初行第二犯根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
tgt_original: 「復次，初行者或說是言：

src_original: kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena /  śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /
tgt_original: 『汝用善持調伏戒為？

src_original: mahāyānaṃ paṭha /  yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
tgt_original: 但當速發菩提之心，汝當讀誦大乘經典，身口意惡當得清淨無有惡報。

src_original: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 』餘如上說，是名初行第三犯根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
tgt_original: 「復次，初行者若說是言：

src_original: varjayata yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śrāvakayānakathāṃ /  mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
tgt_original: 『汝有大德，應離聲聞法，勿聽勿讀勿為他說。 汝善男子！

src_original: gopayata śrāvakayānakathāṃ /  na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /  na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /  śraddadhata mahāyānakathāṃ /  śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /
tgt_original: 當隱藏聲聞經法，聲聞法中不得大乘，不能令汝使得邊際，唯當聽受大乘經典為他人說。

src_original: tato yūyaṃ sarvadurgatyapāyapathān śamayiṣyatha /  kṣipraṃ cānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyatha //
tgt_original: 汝諸惡業當得清淨，疾成佛道。

src_original: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ /  ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 』若受是語攝取是見，二俱犯罪，是名初行菩薩第四犯根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti /  idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti  evaṃ ca vakṣyanti /  vayaṃ mahāyānikā nānye /  te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
tgt_original: 「復次，初行者妄語、兩舌，異思說大乘異經典，為於名譽利養受持讀誦，如其所聞為他廣說，作如是言：

src_original: ātmānaṃ cotkarṣayanti na tān /
tgt_original: 『我知大乘，非餘人也。

src_original: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
tgt_original: 』見他得利心生嫉妬，說他惡名誹謗毀呰，自說得過人法。

src_original: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti /
tgt_original: 是人破壞犯墮重罪，離大乘法當墮惡道，如人入海求寶船敗沒死，是初行者亦復如是，是名初行第五犯根本重罪。
